    • Method Detail

      • updateHub

        public void updateHub(int score,
                      int lives)
        Method that the game will call to update the game's hub
        Parameters:
        score - he player current score
        lives - the number of Pacman's lives

      • initFruit

        public void initFruit(char sprite)
        This method will be called by the game to determine the fruit sprite
        The sprite will be displayed in the hub when Pacman eat the fruit
        Parameters:
        sprite - Which sprite should be loaded.

      • move

        public void move(Characters character,
                 java.awt.Point oldP,
                 char oldC)
        This method move a sprite on the grid from a point to another. To get the component Case we must calculate his number. Then we retrieve the case and we swap it with the next case. If the sprite moving is the pacman, we remove the gums when he walk through them.
        Parameters:
        character - The character who moved.
        oldP - The origin point of the sprite
        oldC - The char to the old position

      • putFruit

        public void putFruit(java.awt.Point position,
                     char fruit)
        This method puts a fruit on a cell, we erase the cell and we put the fruit sprite in it. To determine which fruit we need to put, a switch is used in order to retrieve the good sprite.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the fruit
        fruit - The type of the fruit

      • removeSprite

        public void removeSprite(java.awt.Point position)
        This method removes a sprite from its cell;
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the sprite.

      • resetLab

        public void resetLab(Game g)
        This method reset the labyrinth to its original state. It scans the informations of the labyrinth and add the correct informations to the cases based on the informations.
        Parameters:
        g - The game initialized.

      • death

        public void death(java.awt.Point pacman)
        Animation of death.
        Parameters:
        pacman - Where to load the animation
